articles.author: Ashish Dangwal
articles.title: ‘Mischief’ In South China Sea! US Navy’s 7th Fleet Destroyer, USS Milius, ‘Flexes Muscles’ Near China Claimed Mischief Reef - EurAsian Times
articles.description: On April 10, the US Navy dispatched a warship close to a disputed island in the South China Sea, where Beijing has erected military structures to reinforce its claims in the region. The US Navy destroyer’s operation occurred while the Chinese military exhibit…
articles.content:
On April 10, the US Navy dispatched a warship close to a disputed island in the South China Sea, where Beijing has erected military structures to reinforce its claims in the region.
